 3.2 trillion X 8 = 25.6 trillion moles CO2 = 1.13 quadrillion grams CO2 = 512.7 billion pounds of CO2 
 
 
 That's 512.7 billion pounds of CO2 every year.
 
 If we were to fill up a balloon with that amount of CO2 (at 1 atmosphere and at 25C) the balloon would have a volume of 626 trillion liters or 164 trillion gallons.
